headline: Blackstone Acquires Retail REIT In $4 Billion Deal – Big Bet On American Shoppers
summary: Blackstone Real Estate (NYSE:BX) is paying $4 billion for Retail Opportunity Investment Corp. (NASDAQ:ROIC) in an all-cash deal, including debt. The move comes after Reuters reported that the alternative asset manager was negotiating to buy the ...
